column1: # Example file of stock to load
# Lines starting with a hash # and empty lines are ignored
# Each line contains the following columns (semi-coljumn separated)
# - sort order:          value used to sort product (sorted by type, group, sort order)
# - price cash:          price applied to product if paid in cash
# - price cc:            price applied to product if paid with a credit card (allows to apply different prices if you want to let to buyer paid CC fees)
# - initial quantity:    initial quantity for product in stock
# - type label:          type of product - products are grouped by their type
# - type icon:           reference to a font-awesome icon for type
# - group label:         group for product label (allows to group same t-shirt with different size for example)
# - group icon:          icon to use for group, can be a reference to font-awesome icon, or a valid SVG icon
# - group bg color:      background color for gorup icon
# - group fg color:      foreground color for group icon (if font-awesome ico, ignored for SVG icons)
